options.content: [This vault](https://app.ribbon.finance/theta-vault/T-WBTC-C) earns yield on its WBTC deposits by running an automated WBTC covered call strategy.
[This vault](https://app.ribbon.finance/theta-vault/T-ETH-C) earns yield on its ETH deposits by running an automated ETH covered call strategy.

[This vault](https://app.ribbon.finance/theta-vault/T-USDC-P-ETH) earns yield on its USDC deposits by running an automated strategy that sells ETH put options. The idea is to profit when the asset goes up in price

panels.description:
Open Interest on Ribbon vs. Deribit on the Current Strike price and Expiry . 

Note this takes from the vault total balance and based when funds where added may not reflect the total sold
panels.title: Ribbon vs. Deribit Open Interest

Ribbon v. Deribit Total OI Given Strike

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  strike as metric,
  venue,
  oi as value
FROM
  ribbon.deribit_ribbon_skew
group by strike, venue, oi
order by strike

panels.title: Open Interest with Ribbon BTC Calls

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  strike as metric,
  venue,
  oi as value
FROM
  ribbon.deribit_skew
group by strike, venue, oi
order by strike

panels.description: Total OI (calls and puts) for BTC or ETH that Ribbon makes up of Deribit
panels.title: % Total OI RIbbon vs. Deribit
